name: Sophie The Slug
description:
Guide Sophie around the puzzles and try to reach the exit while using special tiles to your advantage. The game includes crates, breakable tiles portals and many more obstacles you need to overcome to complete the maze.

Use the arrow keys or click and swipe in the direction you want to move. Follow the in-game instructions to learn how to use the special tiles to your advantage.

Earn achievement medals for your effort while playing at medalgames.com.
